Text: I don't know what happened but Avast reported a Trojan and stopped the dld. This is a first for me with wendy's games. Anyone else having similar problems?
have downloaded this game and found no virus or trojan in it . scanned with avast as well
Seems to work fine for me running 64 bit Windows 7 system :) Thanks!
Big Thanx. I have been dling from you for a very long time and thought I should finally thank you. :D
Thanks Wendy! You are an awesome person to do this for everyone.  I always look for your games when I want to get one.  You are very trustworthy! Thanks for everything!
Perfect game from the perfect uploader. No viruses at all. Thanks ;o)
